text: Heinz Hermann Thiele (2 April 1941 â€“ 23 February 2021) was a German businessman. He was the chairman of Knorr-Bremse AG and Vossloh. At the time of his death, he was also the largest shareholder in the German carrier Lufthansa AG. With a net worth of $20.2 billion, he was the fourth richest person in Germany at the time of his death. Thiele died on 23 February 2021 in Munich at age 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German businesspeople Category:People from Mainz
title: Heinz Hermann Thiele
